title: Implementation of a Health Insurance Scheme for the Judges
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. (Dr.) Wijayadasa Rajapaksa, the Minister of Justice, to grant a health insurance cover of Rs.500,000.00 to all Judges of the Courts, subject to outdoor treatments of Rs.35,000.00, and to bear 75% of its subscription by the Government, was approved by the Cabinet.
